      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Several things are assumed in this method (see other methods of this class). Checked:
        - Type binding: default value matches current value, both match the registered type. - Type validity: registered type is valid. - Restrictions: if registered type has a restriction, type binding and validity is checked against it.
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface IValidated
